message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give you the majority!
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more!
I'm not getting any younger, let's get this done!
I'm not backing down, I want a bigger share!
I'm not getting any younger, and the money's losing value fast! Let's meet in the middle... my way!
I'm not giving up, I'll take what's left!
I'm not giving up, and I'm not going to let you take the majority! Let's meet in the middle... almost!
I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not going down without a fight!
I'm not going to give up now, Bob! Let's get this done!
I'm taking what I can get, it's almost over!
